TopicTitle: Just 7 days til Kerbal Space Program 1.0 comes out!

Articles.Content:
We're proud to announce Kerbal Space Program will be released on the 27th of April. Enjoy the first preview video!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/VuZRHGIvWho?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
